name: Garry Chiao
headline: Full‑stack artisan
summary: Skilled and collaborative web developer with 7+ years of experience in developing effective solutions to complex problems using a combination of technical expertise and a user-centered approach to deliver systems and web pages.

bullets: Lead a freelance company of six members with extensive experience in web development locally and abroad.
Manage interactions between clientele and the team to deliver custom solutions addressing specific needs.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients and stakeholders.
Ensure systems meet high standards of quality and usability through a hands-on approach.
Collaborate with a team to develop campaign strategies and messaging for supporters and donors.
Manage contact lists and track engagement metrics to ensure outreach is effective and well-targeted.
Proficient web and blockchain developer (Vue.js, Node.js, Solidity, GCP services).
Create high-quality, user-focused applications that solve real and virtual world problems.

education.school: National Central University (國立中央大學)
